mapper.select: select id, scenic_spot_info_id, main_image, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, image_6, image_7, image_8, user_id, create_time, update_time from Travel.scenic_spot_images where id = #{id}

select id, scenic_spot_info_id, main_image, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, image_6, image_7, image_8, user_id, create_time, update_time from Travel.scenic_spot_images limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into Travel.scenic_spot_images(scenic_spot_info_id, main_image, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, image_6, image_7, image_8, user_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{scenicSpotInfoId}, #{mainImage}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{image5}, #{image6}, #{image7}, #{image8}, #{userId}, now(), now())
mapper.update:
update Travel.scenic_spot_images
scenic_spot_info_id = #{scenicSpotInfoId},
main_image = #{mainImage},
image_1 = #{image1},
image_2 = #{image2},
image_3 = #{image3},
image_4 = #{image4},
image_5 = #{image5},
image_6 = #{image6},
image_7 = #{image7},
image_8 = #{image8},
user_id = #{userId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id}

insert into Travel.scenic_spot_images(scenic_spot_info_id, main_image, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, image_6, image_7, image_8, user_id, create_time, update_time)values
( #{vo.scenicSpotInfoId}, #{vo.mainImage}, #{vo.image1}, #{vo.image2}, #{vo.image3}, #{vo.image4}, #{vo.image5}, #{vo.image6}, #{vo.image7}, #{vo.image8}, #{vo.userId}, now(), now() )
